body_html:
Hey @Chandrahas1991

There was no error. The simple issue was that I was truncating my sequences not small enough, and the computation time blew up (~O(n^4)). Cutting the length into 1/3 resulted in getting approximately what I expect in terms of computation time.

Cheers,
Dylan

body:
Hey @Chandrahas1991 

There was no error. The simple issue was that I was truncating my sequences not small enough, and the computation time blew up (~O(n^4)). Cutting the length into 1/3 resulted in getting approximately what I expect in terms of computation time. 

Cheers,
Dylan
